reviews.review_msg: I took 2 upper division courses with Eline. She is very dedicated to her work and knows her stuff. She definitely is helpful and a  kind person. The amount of course work was fair--it wasn't a class you can sleep through but it wasn't very hard either. Would highly highly recommend her!!

She is extremely nice and helpful. I would totally recommend her to anyone!! She is not hard at all and you will walk away learning something new. Took 2 classes with her so far, looking to take many many more!
